name: Summoner Apprentice Demo
description:
The gameplay in detail

You start off as an apprentice to a renowned summoner, and as part of your training you get to summon minions to defend your power crystal and also destroy the one your enemy controls.

  • At the start of each level, you get to see which enemies you will face during the encounter. You can therefore plan your strategy accordingly.
  • After each level, the deck building part comes into play and you have the chance to pick a new card from the draft pool and add it to your deck.
  • Beat a few more levels and you will get to pick a Relic to customize your play style. 
  • You will also have to choose Curses to make your training more challenging.
  • When the going gets tough, but you're not tough enough to get going, you will receive some new cards and upgrade points to improve your minions.
  • To beat the game and become a true Summoner you have to complete all the challenges/quests. And I can promise you it's not going to be easy!
